meanings.definition: The state or quality of being screwy.
meanings.sent1: Her constant screwinesses made it hard to predict her actions.
meanings.sent2: The screwinesses of the situation were confusing to everyone involved.
meanings.sent3: The screwinesses of the clown's behavior kept the audience entertained.
meanings.sent4: The screwinesses of the puzzle made it challenging to solve.
meanings.sent5: The screwinesses of the weather patterns caused unexpected storms.

meanings.sent1: The movie was full of hilarious screwinesses that had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent2: We encountered many screwinesses during our road trip.
meanings.sent3: The screwinesses of the cat's antics always brought joy to the family.
meanings.sent4: The screwinesses of the old clock made it a unique antique.
meanings.sent5: The screwinesses of the science experiment led to unexpected results.
